Summary: White lite reacting to thoughts with witnesses.
divs: Sighting Detailsok then...sitting on back verandah that is directly next to a gold courseno roadetc inbetween with a friend...ok we were drinking but we definetly had fullcontrol of our senses...theres some trees on this course of course the distanceof the width of a gold fairway...these trees are about 20 storeys high yesbig....and the event ocurred above these...NOT DIRECTLY ABOVE but above inrelation to our line of sight in wich we were looking se for the entire periodof the event..there where two clouds cumulous one was like the letter L shape but lying downif you rotated the L 90degrees anti-clockwise with the bottom of the L beingquite short...the other another standard cigar shaped cloud but a bit larger andon the right side of the first...liie this ----5E -----------i was actually thinking about ufos at the time, and had discussed them with theother witness before, but we were not talking about them previous to thesighting...i was actually thinking wouldnt it be nice if a UFO just came up andflew along the top of the first couldskimming the surface if you will in regardsof line of sightand then trace the last hump of the cloud thus changingdirecions and clearing up any disbelief i might have of the phenomina...and thenalond from the more eastern side left a disc shaped dark gun metal grey objectflew towards our right at a pace probably three times the speed of a 747 at thesame distance, and skimmed the surface of the cloudre line of sightand thentraced the remainder of the cloud until it got to the right hand W side and flewbehind the cloud. i was watching carefully and as the object flew e w in and outfrom behind the right side if the could i notified my fried to get up and look.this was suprisingly easy and the words that i used to describe the clound andobject position came out easy and he saw it immediately..then we just watchedand i after a short periodyour gonna luagh actually held up my beer and said bagit up do some space doughnuts referring to slang that you would use yelling atsomeone driving a car and asking them to do a burnout...the object then contiuedto duck in and out of the cloud for about 10 secs up an down too like a clamerversion of a fly..until it accelerrated in the exact same direction as it wasfirst travveling towards the second cloud...slow faster faster like a perfectversion of acceleration3E3E until it got infront of the second cloudso inside atmosphere for sure andthen a bright flash of brilliant perfect white like a star in the day...coveredthe whole object and it expand
